long_description: The Tifosi Mast Interchangeable Sunglasses are like armour for your eyes, protecting them from harsh rays with lightweight, durable materials built for any adventure or light condition. Featuring interchangeable lenses, frame includes 3 sets of lenses that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. The Tifosi Mast Interchangeable Sunglasses fit medium to large faces. Glasses come with a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth. Closeout.
short_description: The Tifosi Mast Interchangeable Sunglasses are like armour for your eyes, protecting them from harsh rays with lightweight, durable materials built for any adventure or light condition.
